function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Cognizance of risks associated with engaging with strangers in public spaces","Impact":"Change in social interaction and assembly in public spaces","Mitigation":"Public awareness and education on safe interaction practices","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, informational signage","People":"General public, urban planners, policymakers","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limitation of active engagement in public spaces due to social distancing measures","Impact":"Reduced direct experience and interaction in public spaces","Mitigation":"Designing public spaces to facilitate safe and limited interaction","Technologies":"Contactless technology, spatial design","People":"Urban planners, architects, public space managers","Owner":"Urban planning agencies, city governments"},{"Description":"Alteration of triadic relationships in urban discourse due to post-pandemic considerations","Impact":"Change in the understanding of place and urban design principles","Mitigation":"Reassessing and redefining the factors contributing to a sense of place","Technologies":"Smart city technologies, urban data analytics","People":"Urban theorists, urban planners, architects","Owner":"Research institutions, urban planning agencies"}]}
